TopicTitle: Bring out the pots and pans!

Articles.Content: My home team won the NBA Championship . So happy for this series. It was amazing, and the last game was truly a nailbiting experience. The Spurs were truly an amazing team to play against and I wouldn't have had it any other way. Next up Dolphins at superbowl (Kidding about that last one) If you guys have any opinions on the finals let them be aired here!
